title: Sweet Ferocity
description: I was a mafia mercenary only hired to find her, but now Iâ€™m going to keep her. She is a Russian mafia princess, kidnapped to be used as a pawn in a dangerous territory war.Saving her was my job. Keeping her safe had become my obsession. Every move she makes, I am in the shadows, watching. I was like a feral animal: cruel, violent, and selfishly out for my own needs. Until her. Now, I will make her mine by any means necessary. I am her protector, but no one is going to protect her from me.
author: Zoe Blake
